attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned electorate of the United Kingdom demand that in response to the Scottish Independence Referendum, the UK Government now devolve full economic powers to the Scottish Parliament.

We also demand that the UK Government devolves full powers to an English, Welsh and Irish Parliament.

A federal type constitution for our 4 home nations should deliver substantive powers of self determination while under the banner, cooperation and continued union of our United Kingdom and while retaining our monarchy.

The mandate for this petition has been given to the people of the UK by the electorate of Scotland with an overwhelming 45% vote of no confidence in Westminster politics and a thin rejection of independence on the promise of devolution in Scotland.

This mandate is for radical change to governance throughout the UK and in England where devolution must be delivered on a fair and equal basis.
